autotrade.config.configs.enabled.name: enabled
autotrade.config.configs.enabled.comment: Do auto trading with villagers in range
autotrade.config.configs.enablesell.name: enableSell
autotrade.config.configs.enablesell.comm: Enable selling (if disabled emeralds are taken from the input container)
autotrade.config.configs.sellitem.name: sellItem
autotrade.config.configs.sellitem.commen: The item to sell for emerald.
autotrade.config.configs.selllimit.name: sellLimit
autotrade.config.configs.enablebuy.name: enableBuy
autotrade.config.configs.enablebuy.comme: Enable buying (if disabled emeralds are placed in the output container)
autotrade.config.configs.buyitem.name: buyItem
autotrade.config.configs.buyitem.comment: The item to buy using emerald.
autotrade.config.configs.buylimit.name: buyLimit
stacks to take from input container (or emerald container in buy-only mode)
autotrade.config.configs.inputcontainerx: Input container X (not used when sell disabled)
autotrade.config.configs.inputcontainery: Input container Y (not used when sell disabled)
autotrade.config.configs.inputcontainerz: Input container Z (not used when sell disabled)
autotrade.config.configs.outputcontainer: Output container X (not used when buy disabled)
Output container Y (not used when buy disabled)
Output container Z (not used when buy disabled)
autotrade.config.configs.voidtradingdela: delay in ticks for void trading
autotrade.config.configs.delayaftertelep: true: Start the delay after the villager was unloaded; false: Start the delay after the trade has been initiated
autotrade.config.configs.containerclosed: delay in ticks; to get signal from trapped chest
autotrade.config.hotkeys.setsellitem.com: Sets the item to sell from hotbar
autotrade.config.hotkeys.setbuyitem.name: setBuyItem
autotrade.config.hotkeys.setbuyitem.comm: Sets the item to buy from hotbar
autotrade.config.hotkeys.setinputcontain: Sets the input (item to sell) container
autotrade.config.hotkeys.setoutputcontai: Sets the output (item to buy) container
